name: City Ripper!
description:
You're Commander Destroyer

You job is to destroy cloud colonies  by using your new super weapon. 

Control and destroy all of them.

WASD to move.

*Due to unedited audio, beware of audio volume. 

Credit:

Isometric tile set : https://green-cube-studios.itch.io/isometric-mini-mars-colony-pack

BGM: Purple Planet
